StyleCategoryDef.label: Saxhleel Traditional Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Traditional Saxhleel weapons crafted from sacred Hist wood and blessed materials, featuring organic curves and natural motifs that reflect the deep connection to Black Marsh's environment.

StyleCategoryDef.label: An-Xileel Militant Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Military weapons of the An-Xileel, designed for guerrilla warfare and featuring practical, efficient designs with tactical modifications suitable for marsh combat operations.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Shadowscale Hidden Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Concealed weapons of the Shadowscales, featuring curved blades, toxin applications, and designs optimized for stealth kills and silent elimination of targets.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Hist Keeper Sacred Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Sacred implements of the Hist Keepers, featuring living wood construction, crystallized Hist sap focuses, and designs that channel spiritual energy and natural healing power.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Thornscale Warrior Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Brutal weapons of the Thornscale clan, featuring intimidating spikes, heavy construction, and designs meant to project strength and inspire fear in enemies during combat.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Glade Runner Scout Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Practical weapons of the Glade Runners, featuring lightweight construction, enhanced accuracy, and designs optimized for long-range reconnaissance and mobile combat operations.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Root-Whisper Ancient Weapons
StyleCategoryDef.description: Ancient weapons of the Root-Whisper tribe, featuring primitive but sophisticated craftsmanship using only traditional materials and techniques passed down through countless generations.
